title: ECHS Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for Medical Officer Posts
description: The Ex-Servicemen Contributory Health Scheme (ECHS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Medical Officer Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th pass can apply for the ECHS Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee...
